channel.title: My caskets and clue's Can be spam clicked. PI (rep++)
channel.description:
Hi there, There is something wrong with my Caslets and clue scroll methods. When you click it it will give you the random items or cash, but when you spam click it you'll get like 5/15 rewards
Also these items are kinda an big Piece in my economy, so i need to fix it soon.
I hope you guys can help me out

item.title: My caskets and clue's Can be spam clicked. PI (rep++)
item.dc:creator: @DevotionPk DevotionPk
item.description:
@DevotionPk wrote:

Plz point me one, i searched but i found stuff i dont know, i guess i need to add something in actionhandler right?

Read full topic
item.source: My caskets and clue's Can be spam clicked. PI (rep++)

item.title: My caskets and clue's Can be spam clicked. PI (rep++)
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

[quote=“DevotionPk, post:3, topic:438729”][quote author=Skiire link=topic=541435.msg3966306#msg3966306 date=1333746790]
Implement cycle event manager, if you haven’t already. Add a new event every-time they click either item, add a timer.
[/quote]

hmm i could use some help with that, could you help me further? like Show me the code ( not as in spoonfeeding) because i’ll learn from it and can use it on many other things.[/quote]

There are a lot of tutorials on this (moparscape) that could explain it a lot better than I could.

Read full topic
